entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
